name: Glue Gauntlet
description:
Glue Gauntlet is a grid based Sokoban game with a twist: boxes, players and walls can all be covered in glue! Navigate your way through 38 unique adhesive-filled levels to become the champion of the Glue Gauntlet!

Use the ARROW KEYS/WASD to move, Z/U to undo, R to restart, and X to skip a level.

If you beat the game, let me know what you think!!
